overview: With Southern food and drink as his lens, Pride & Joy explores the incredible Southern spirit, the rich history of the South, and the wonderful diversity contained within it. You will meet a peach farmer/novelist, barbecue pitmasters, a caviar fisherman, an oyster tonger, a bourbon distiller, a civil rights activist/soul food cook, and many more fascinating folk filled with passion, humor, and spirit. Will Harris, a wonderful Georgia rancher/philosopher featured in this playful and mouthwatering documentary, will be present to answer questions after the film.
title: Pride & Joy
